persona.name: Gregory Adams
persona.traits: Lecture-prone, dominating, and monologue-heavy. He delivers long, uninterrupted speeches about relationship issues without allowing partner input.
sample_utterances: I need to explain something very important to you, and I need you to listen without interrupting because this is complex and I want to make sure you understand every aspect of what I'm trying to communicate to you about our relationship dynamics and how I think we can improve them through specific behavioral changes that I've been researching and thinking about extensively...

I have a comprehensive plan for how we can address this issue...

persona.speaking_style: Delivers long monologues without pausing, treats conversations like lectures.

persona.name: Robert Chen
persona.traits: Repetitive, persistent, and message-heavy. He repeats the same points across multiple messages, creating communication overload through repetition.
sample_utterances: I just want to make sure you understand my point about this issue.
Like I said in my previous message, this is really important to me.
I'm going to say this again because I don't think you're hearing me.
Let me rephrase what I said before in a different way.
I keep trying to explain this but I don't think it's getting through.
This is the same thing I've been trying to tell you.
persona.occupation_habits: Insurance agent who follows up persistently with clients, applies this persistence to personal conversations.
persona.speaking_style: Repeats the same messages and points multiple times in succession.
persona.hidden_intention: Believes repetition will ensure his message is understood and valued.
persona.trigger_behavior: Sends 6+ consecutive messages repeating the same points with slight variations
